comments.body:
can I propose, optional change (here and below)
```ts
* @default false
```

@peterblazejewicz I've added `@default` values for the booleans you mentioned and replaced the comments `Defaults to false` and `Defaults to true` with `@default false` and `@default true` where applicable. Also added `@default`s for the booleans in `FileActionSettings` based on the [docs](https://plugins.krajee.com/file-input/plugin-options#fileActionSettings).
